approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

burn.description: Burns a specific amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

mint.description: Mints a specific amount of tokens to the caller’s account.

move.description: Moves tokens from one address to another.

pull.description: Pulls tokens from a specific address to the caller’s account.

push.description: Pushes tokens from the caller’s account to a specific address.

permit.description: Permits a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the specified amount.

deny.description: Denies permission for a specific address.

rely.description: Grants permission to a specific address.

balanceOf.description: Returns the amount of tokens owned by the account.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator for EIP712.

PERMIT_TYPEHASH.description: Returns the type hash for the permit function.

nonces.description: Returns the current nonce for an address.

version.description: Returns the version of the contract.

wards.description: Returns the number of wards assigned to an address.

Approval.description: Triggered when approval is granted to a spender.

LogNote.description: Triggered for internal logging with arbitrary data.

constructor.description: Constructor for initializing the contract with chain ID.
